product_name: TYR CharacTYRs Happy Fish Goggles - Kids'
long_description: The TYR CharacTYRs Happy Fish goggles add fun color and cute character to your kid's swimming lessons or splashy summertime fun. Shatter-resistant polycarbonate lenses feature antifog treatment and UV protection. Silicone gaskets create a soft and watertight seal. The TYR CharacTYRs Happy Fish goggles feature easy-to-adjust side clips and nose bridge for a comfortable, customizable fit.
short_description: The TYR CharacTYRs Happy Fish goggles add fun color and cute character to your kid's swimming lessons or splashy summertime fun.
